attributes.action: End Public Sector Engagement with the Sun
attributes.additional_details: In view of the weight of evidence from the Hillsborough Panel we ask the Prime Minister, Deputy Prime Minister & Cabinet in its defination and delivery of the government's objectives to drive cross-departmental priority issues and the drive for the coherence, quality and delivery of policy and operations across departments to lead from the top down and mandate the ending of all public sector advertising and media engagement with the News Corporation's Sun newspaper.
